long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HoopsHub is the Google Chrome extension for all your basketball needs!
HoopsHub has many handy features:
- displays today's games, as well as upcoming games (within the next week)
- provides the option for the user to remind themselves of a particular game
- provides streaming links for each game
